quotes.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: I'm not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.text: I haven't failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: The trouble with having an open mind is that people keep coming along and sticking things into it.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: I find television very educational. Every time someone turns it on, I go in the other room and read a book.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: Common sense is like deodorant. The people who need it most never use it.
quotes.author: Bill Murray
